document.masterDocTitle: Checklist and distribution atlas of the Scarabaeinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) of Costa Rica

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist and distribution atlas of the Scarabaeinae (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae) of Costa Rica

subSubSection.paragraph:
Neocanthidium Martínez, Halffter
, & Pereira, 1964
C. angusticeps Bates, 1887

C . martinezi Edmonds & Halffter, 1978
C. darwini Kohlmann & Solís, 2009
C. discopygidiale
Howden & Young, 1981
C. emoryi Solís & Kohlmann, 2004
C. guanacaste
Howden & Gill, 1987
C. haroldi Preudhomme
de Borre, 1886
C. hespenheidei
Howden & Young, 1981
C. laetum Harold, 1867
